description: Michael Lucas walks around Moscows historic Red Square, where he is approached by a trio of gorgeous young Russian guys (Dimitri Checkhov, Misha Petrov and Andrei Nemov). Later on, they join him at his hotel suite for a hot fourway, and Lucas gets to fuck all three.
title: Michael Lucas, Andrei Nemov, Dimitri Checkov, and Misha Petrov
